globalHeaders.Permissions-Policy: accelerometer=(), camera=(), geolocation=(), gyroscope=(), magnetometer=(), microphone=(), payment=(), usb=()
globalHeaders.Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://alcdn.msauth.net; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data: https:; connect-src 'self' https://raw.githubusercontent.com https://api.github.com https://login.microsoftonline.com https://*.azurewebsites.net; frame-src https://login.microsoftonline.com
